body.name: Straw Cup Soft Conversion Kit for Philips Avent Natural Baby Bottle, Toddler Transition Kit with Silicone Straw Top Nipple, Weighted Straw, Bottle Handle, Cleaning Brush, Spill-Proof, BPA-Free, 3-Pack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 15 mins
features: Universal Compatibility: Our straw cup soft conversion kit is designed to seamlessly fit Philips Avent Natural Baby Bottles of all sizes and materials, whether they're made of glass or plastic. The kit includes 3 soft silicone straw spout nipples, 3 weighted straw attachments, 3 straw cleaning brushes, and 3 bottle handles. It's the all-in-one solution for your baby's transition from bottle to straw cup.
Smooth Transition: The soft silicone spout design ensures a smooth and comfortable transition for your baby. They'll find it familiar and reassuring as they make the switch from bottle to straw cup.

Safety and Health: Our straw cup conversion kit is crafted from food-grade silicone, making it completely free from BPA, phthalates, and lead. Your baby's safety and well-being are our top priorities.

Innovative Design: Our kit features innovative elements, including leak-proof straw spouts, gentle-on-the-gums design, adjustable flow, and cross-cut options, ensuring a hassle-free feeding experience for your growing baby.

This is an after-sales product specially produced by XUNICUTE and not associated with PHILIPS. If you have any questions about our product, please feel free to contact us to provide you with a solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love that she can continue using her favorite bottles
reviews.reviewText: My daughter had gotten to where she doesn't have any interest in other cups. But, it's time we start weaning. This is a great way to recycle those expensive bottles as baby gets older.The price, I find to be not much better than getting new bottles nipples from the store, with these coming out to almost $6 per soppy cup kit.The product itself: it fits perfectly! While it comes with the weighted straw, we actually aren't using that part yet. The spout does work just fine by itself for us. The straw did seem to work okay, but she kept trying to tilt the cup like she does bottles. In time I'll start putting that back on when she gets cups of water (with the straw being so thin, I'm going to avoid milk/ formula with it)Overall, this was a great find that will give our expensive bottles even more use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have!
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves the Advent natural bottles and we have really struggled using sippy cups due to this. I purchased this conversion kit so that she can continue using the Advent bottles and it has been amazing! The handles are great at helping her learn to tilt her bottles up to drink. The sippy conversion is exactly what she needed and is now using it to learn how to use a sippy. It's easy to clean and works well with no leaks. This kit also allows me to use her already purchased bottles instead of having to throw them away and by a bunch of sippy cups. This is a must have for any parent and I will definitely be purchasing more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Conversion Kit for Bottles
reviews.reviewText: I tossed the Avent bottles a while ago but still had a few 9oz Dr Browns in the cupboard that I had been using to send milk to grandma's so I decided to give these a shot anyway. The lids and spouts fit perfectly, and work great on this brand too! My toddler likes to tip his cups to drink so I like weighted straws for his water. I wouldn't recommend putting anything but water in weighted straw cups since they are so difficult to clean. These will extend the life of your bottles, and are easy for babies/toddlers to learn to use too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Extends the useful life of the Avent Natural flow bottles
reviews.reviewText: We are using Philips Avent Natural flow bottles for our 7 m.o daughter as as she is just beginning to hold objects and self feed, we wanted to buy a sipper for her to learn . Just then we came across this conversion kit that would convert these bottles with handles as well as a sippy cup for self feeding. Naturally we were excited to try this instead buying a new sippy cup mainly because our daughter is already very familiar with the Avent bottles and knows how to use them , so the transition to learning self feeding and using it as a sippy cup for water would be much quicker and easier .QUALITY- The overall quality of the conversion kit is very good : from the plastic handles , body and the silicone spout , all feel of very good OEM-like qualityFIT - All the parts of the conversion kit fitted our 8Oz Avent bottle perfectly, from the handles and the sippy cup attachment/spout- There were no leaks in after either just just the handles with the original Avent nipple or the sippy cup conversion spoutUSING IT/LIKES- Our daughter got used to the handles and the sippy cup modification very quickly. In fact , at first she was very curious about it because it was something new on our regular feeding bottle and I think that played a large part in her learning to use it and self feed so quickly- The weighted straw means that baby is taking in more of her milk water all the time rather than air , no matter what position they are holding the bottle in .- The cleaning brushes were a nice little addition as wellDISLIKES- The only minor dislike I can think of is that they do not come with a cap for the sippy cup spout in the pack . Now granted that the OEM Avent caps fit on these just fine but then you would have to leave the main nipple exposed . Having its own caps would have been much better for hygiene and traveling purposesFINAL THOUGHTSOverall this is a very nice conversion set that will not only eliminate the need for you to get another sippy cup while your child grows, but also help in learning self feeding much faster because they are already used to the OEM Philips bottle and will adapt faster.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy for baby
reviews.reviewText: My almost 1 year old really likes these and has no problem holding them. She will be transitioning to milk this week so might as well introduce her to sippy cups too. She has used a couple before but I think the fact this is more like her bottle was a good starting point!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve ordered similar from a different seller and those work better than these. The breather ports were sealed and all of them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First off I over all love this! It first both my plastic and glass Avent natural bottles. I like that it can be used with or without the handles and I absolutely love that the tubing can be completely disassembled to fully clean. Now I would not recommend these for babies transitioning from a bottle as the spout flow is pretty quick and it does leak a bit if left upside down. Honestly the only thing I would change if I could change anything is the shape of the spout. I wish it were an actual straw shape and not the sippy cup shape but that’s my preference for my child’s oral development. But to have on hand as an easy extra cup option I love these and again my favorite part is how easy they are to clean! There is also quite a bit of length to the tubing so you could always trim that to fit your bottles better, for instance it’s entirely too long for the four ounce bottles but you can cut it to size without issue. Five stars from me for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My child loves them
reviews.reviewText: These tops fit my Phillips avent glass bottles perfectly and made an easy transition for my baby. I didnt want to have to go buy sippy cups so these tops were a perfect option. The weighted straw works well and the nipples can be used with or without them and they come with their own cleaning brushes to make cleaning the straws easy. 10/10
